2.0.name: wordpress/adonide-faq-plugin
2.0.description:
Languages

  • HTML FAQ PAGE is available in 3 languages.
  • FR.
  • EN.
  • DE.
  • and coming more..

What's new on 2.0

  • Updating jquery library to the lastest version.
  • Insert more than a faq page on your web site.
  • Re-order questions never been easier ( just drag and drop )
  • Configuration Page

How to use HTML FAQ PAGE

  • Add questions ( text, video, link, ...) and answers.
  • Insert the shortcode [faq_collect cat=3] any where on your posts or pages.
  • Enjoy your HTML FAQ page.

More information

  • bassem.rabia[at]hotmail[dot]co[dot]uk
  • Thank's.
